question:
Which of the following discoveries is/are associated with Einstein?
(i) Theory of relativity
(ii) Quantum theory
(iii) Radio activity
(iv) Rocket propulsion
explanation:
Theory of relativity- Albert Einstein
• Quantum theory- Modern quantum mechanics was born in 1925 when the German physicists Werner Heisenberg, Max Born, and Pascual Jordan developed matrix mechanics and the Austrian physicist Erwin Schrodinger invented wave mechanics.
• Radio activity - The discovery of radioactivity took place over several years beginning with the discovery of x-rays in 1895 by Wilhelm Conrad Roentgen.
• Rocket propulsion - Dr. Robert Hutchings Goddard is considered the father of modern rocket propulsion.
